page.title: 06WETHERBY FIRE SERVICE
page.content: Wetherby Fire Service consists of one appliance, operated by 28 men, all full time, 4 on duty on each shift. It covers an area of about 100 square miles, and attends approximately 250 call-outs per year, ranging from the ordinary fire calls to the special service calls. At Wetherby they have special cutting gear and chemical protection suits for accidents on the nearby A1. The{Thermal Image Scope}and the {computer call-out system}are seen as future technological developments. Otherwise they don't think that the fire service will change, except for the way that products are constructed. They think that new materials such as foam rubber and fibre-optics will hopefully be used more often by the manufacturers.
